ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookUrl:
<js>
var bid=parseInt(java.getString('$.bookId'));

if(!bid>0){
bid=parseInt(java.getString('$.id'));
}
java.put("bid",bid);
var subpath=parseInt((1999+bid)/2000);
var url="http://statics.ywpxg.com/static/book/zip/"+subpath+"/"+bid+".zip";
//java.log(url)
result=url;</js>
ruleSearch.name: $.name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.lang.reflect,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.org.jsoup,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);

with(javaImport){
function getZipContent(url){
var res=ByteArrayOutputStream();
var map= HashMap()
map.put("Content-Type","application/zip");
var v1=java.get(url,map).bodyAsBytes()
//java.log(v1)
var bis=ByteArrayInputStream(v1);
var zis=ZipInputStream(bis);
var entry=null;
 while((entry= zis.getNextEntry())!=null){
      if(entry.getName()=="chapter.json"){
        var buffer= Array.newInstance(Byte.TYPE, 1024);
        var length;
        while ((length = zis.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                res.write(buffer, 0, length);
              }
        zis.closeEntry();
        
         
     }else{}
 }
return res.toString();



}
}
//java.log("SSSS"+baseUrl)
result=getZipContent(baseUrl)
//java.log(result);

</js>$.data[*]
